resources.string: Failed to load result. Check internet connection and try again. If issues persists, request assistance from facility staff.
Are you sure you want to leave the queue for
You will lose your queue position.
You are not queued for any attractions. Head over to the attraction list and join a queue.
You have left the queue for
You are already queued for this attraction.
Something went wrong. Check your internet connection and try again.
You are queued for this attraction
Q-Up requires the following permissions to enable full functionality:
Q-Up sends notifications with updates about queues and queue times.

Q-Up uses your location to calculate when to send you notifications to start moving towards an attraction. Both "Precise" and "Broad" location are permitted, but for best functionality, select "Precise".
Q-Up needs to use the camera to scan your ticket. The camera is only used for scanning the ticket.
Please press the button below and allow all permissions to continue to the application.
One or more app permissions were denied. These permissions are required for the app to function. Please go to the app settings and enable permissions for Notifications
Scan the QR Code provided by the facility at entry or as part of your ticket to continue.
This ticket is not active yet. Confirm the entry time in your booking and request assistance from facility staff if required.
This ticket has expired. If you believe this to be an error, request assistance from facility staff.
This ticket has already been activated. If you believe this to be an error, request assistance from facility staff.
Something went wrong. Exit this screen and try scanning your code again. If issues persist, request assistance from facility staff.
Are you sure you want to exit the facility?
Exit Facility and Release User ID
Present this ticket at the attraction entrance to gain entry.
Do not scan this ticket yourself. Doing so may cause you to lose your entrance ticket.
Ensure your screen brightness is sufficient for the QR code to be visible.

This is the Attraction Map. The map below displays all the attractions in the facility. Your current location is displayed as a blue dot on the map. Tap a map marker to show the attraction name and status/queue time, then the info window that appears to go the attraction's details page.

If you are queued for an attraction, your remaining queue time will be displayed in the info window.

To get directions to an attraction, tap the marker, then press the blue arrow in the bottom right of the map. This will open the Google Maps app and show you directions to the attraction.

This is the Attraction List. A list of all the attractions in the facility is displayed, sorted alphabetically. Each entry in the list displays the attraction name, attraction type, and estimated queue time. If the attraction is not open, the attraction's current status is displayed instead.

Tap an attraction in the list to go to that attraction's details page.

If you are queued for an attraction, your remaining queue time will be displayed along with a message noting that you are queued for that attraction.

This is Your Queues. All the attractions you are currently queued for are displayed below, with the estimated remaining queue time. Tap on a queue entry to expand it, and press the "Attraction Details" button to go to that attraction's details page, or press "Leave Queue" to leave the queue.

When there are 5 minutes remaining in your queue, your Attraction Entrance Ticket will become available, denoted by a "Entrance ticket available" message on the queue entry. When displayed, opening the queue entry will show a third button, "View Entrance Ticket". Press this button to go to the entrance ticket for this attraction.

After this entrance ticket is generated, you have 20 minutes to enter the attraction, or else your ticket expires and you lose your position in the queue. You will be sent a reminder notification periodically to enter the attraction.

You may receive a notification telling you to start heading to the attraction. This is sent based on your current location so can make it to the attraction by the time your entrance ticket is available.

This is the Attraction Details. All the details about the select attraction are displayed, including the name, type, total length, max capacity, price (if any), location, and description, along with an estimated queue time.

If the attraction is open, a "Join Queue" button will be available in the bottom left of the screen. Press this to join the attraction queue.

If you are already queued for the attraction, a "Leave Queue" button will be available in the bottom left of the screen. Press this to leave the attraction queue.

To get directions to the attraction, tap the marker, then press the blue arrow in the bottom right of the map. This will open the Google Maps app and show you directions to the attraction.

Scan the entrance QR code provided as part of your facility entry or booking to use the application and join virtual queues. If you do not have an entrance QR code or are having issues scanning the code, request assistance from facility staff.
